Html:
Hi,

i wonder if possibile fill the HWND (now throw an exception: {"Member not found. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80020003 (DISP_E_MEMBERNOTFOUND))"}) property of the SlidesShow Window because i need to interact with a wpf application.

 

Thanks in advance,

this is a well known bug in power point, its also not usable with vba or interop.
the workarround for this problem you find here: http://support.microsoft.com/kb/302295
use the winapi function FindWindow, not realy funny i know... :-|
